description: This file contains utility functions for pretty-printing and asynchronously printing run responses, utilizing the 'rich' library for formatted console output. It handles various response types, including synchronous and asynchronous iterables, and formats content based on its type (string, BaseModel, or other).

methods.name: pprint_run_response
methods.description: Synchronously pretty-prints a run response or iterable of responses, formatting the output with the 'rich' library, optionally as Markdown, and including timing information.

methods.name: apprint_run_response
methods.description: Asynchronously pretty-prints a run response or iterable of responses, similar to 'pprint_run_response', but designed for async contexts, handling async iterables and responses.
